thread.title: BRIEF-China FDA Approves Biomerica Colorectal Screening Test To Help Identify The Early Warning Signs Of Colorectal Cancer

title: BRIEF-China FDA Approves Biomerica Colorectal Screening Test To Help Identify The Early Warning Signs Of Colorectal Cancer

organizations.name: early warning signs of colorectal cancer reuters

text:
January 10, 2018 / 1:21 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-China FDA Approves Biomerica Colorectal Screening Test To Help Identify The Early Warning Signs Of Colorectal Cancer Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Biomerica Inc: 
* CHINA FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION (CFDA) APPROVES BIOMERICA COLORECTAL SCREENING TEST TO HELP IDENTIFY THE EARLY WARNING SIGNS OF COLORECTAL CANCER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
